link_desc:
Vertiv / Geist rPDU Template

  • Discovery for PDUs, Phase/Line, Circuit Breakers, and Outlets
  • General information, voltage, current, power, power factor
  • Triggers for PDU alarms and warnings, circuit breaker current, power usage, outlet state changes
  • Graph for PDU Total Power

Directions

  • Add host using agent and SNMP interfaces
  • Link the template
  • Override macros for BREAKER_LIMIT and TOTAL_POWER_LIMIT if desired

This template links the ICMP Ping and SNMP Device templates, so remove those links if you don't want to ping or monitor network interfaces.
author: Nate
